text: Bronisława Marianna Boguska was a Polish educator and advocate for women's education, best known as the mother of Marie Curie, the renowned physicist and chemist. As an educator, she was dedicated to promoting learning and was instrumental in shaping the values of her children, who went on to pursue significant careers in science and medicine. == References == == Other websites == * Marie Curie and Her Family Foundation Category:Polish educators Category:Year of birth missing Category:Year of death missing
title: Bronisława Marianna Boguska
